subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: When the Red Wings and the Penguins play Game 7, Mike Babcock and Dan Bylsma will be trying to outcoach each other. But six years ago they were on the same side in a Game 7.
snippet: When the Red Wings and the Penguins play Game 7, Mike Babcock and Dan Bylsma will be trying to outcoach each other. But six years ago they were on the same side in a Game 7.
